data.name: 0000 (284.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oi, Haruhi! No need to rush, surely?

data.name: 0001 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What do you mean? In fact--you're the one being too relaxed.

data.name: 0002 (284.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Damn it--Haruhi's so fast it looks like she'll make it to the music room in no time.

data.name: 0003 (284.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But, even though I asked Nagato for as much help as she can give…

data.name: 0004 (284.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...her fundamental duty is to "observe," so she surely won't get in her way.

data.name: 0005 (284.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Like bending space-time so she'll never never reach the end of the corridor no matter what…

data.name: 0006 (284.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If Nagato did that, Haruhi would only make a ruckus about it being an unnatural phenomenon.

data.name: 0007 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon!

data.name: 0008 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're slow! No dawdling! Get on with it and run!

data.name: 0009 (284.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We were told not to run in the hallway, right? Are you a child?!

data.name: 0010 (284.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: When Kyon asked Nagato for help...

data.name: 0011 (284.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: ...Nagato tentatively agreed…

data.name: 0012 (284.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Even though her duty is to observe.

data.name: 0013 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru?

data.name: 0014 (284.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Hu--Hyeah--?!

data.name: 0015 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What are you doing standing there? Hurry up and get moving!

data.name: 0016 (284.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes! Coming--

data.name: 0017 (284.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Ah. Wait.

data.name: 0018 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's wrong, Yuki?

data.name: 0019 (284.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …My shoes... came off.

data.name: 0020 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Your shoes? Where?

data.name: 0021 (284.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: There.

data.name: 0022 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …How did they come off so far away? Did you not notice straight away?

data.name: 0023 (284.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I'll get them.

data.name: 0024 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Quickly!

data.name: 0028 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yuki! Hurry!

data.name: 0029 (284.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Understood.

data.name: 0033 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're not going any faster, are you?! Ahhh, jeez--I can't wait any longer!

data.name: 0034 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Here, Yuki--Slippers!

data.name: 0035 (284.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Thanks.

data.name: 0036 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Get ready to hurry once they're on. Ahh, that cost us so much time!

data.name: 0037 (284.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: #P06…Interference--within the permissible limit.

data.name: 0038 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's that?

data.name: 0039 (284.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Nothing.

data.name: 0040 (284.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Nagato appears to be enjoying SOS Brigade activities to a surprising degree.

data.name: 0041 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Of course she is--she's part of the SOS Brigade.

data.name: 0042 (284.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I imagine the reason for why she is always helping out...

data.name: 0043 (284.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...despite always seeming indifferent about all matters, is simply because...

data.name: 0044 (284.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...she is fond of the SOS Brigade, and by extension, you--Miss Suzumiya.

data.name: 0045 (284.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You really think so? Though, I agree Yuki seems to be having fun.
